verbose_text: Addition of HbA 1c levels to 1-h postload plasma glucose levels significantly increased their respective power in predicting development of type 2 diabetes risk, indicating that additional information about type 2 diabetes risk is embedded in HbA 1c.
evidence: HbA 1c  levels to 1-h postload plasma glucose levels significantly increased their respective power in predicting development of type 2 diabetes risk, indicating that additional information about type 2 diabetes risk is embedded in HbA
